column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Vondia has tea to brew, but no ingredients to do so.
Use the preserving agent on tea mushrooms.
Deliver the treated tea mushrooms to Vondia.

Excuse me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. You are one of the visitors from the Crystarium, yes? I realize this is sudden, but may I ask you to gather something for me when next you venture into the woods?

I am to hold a tea ceremony <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>on the morrow<Else/>this afternoon</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>this evening<Else/>on the morrow</If></If>, but only now remembered I have depleted my store of tea mushrooms.
I have not much, but I will see you duly compensated for your troubles.

They can be found to the south in the Citia Swamps. But before you go, you will need this─a preserving agent for the mushrooms. They are quite delicate, and prone to releasing their spores prematurely without it.
If you could gather five, that will be more than enough.
Remember to use the preserving agent before you pick them.
I pray you had no trouble finding the mushrooms?
They contain an ever-so-slight amount of poison, you know. Not enough to cause adverse effects, mind you, but over time one can build an immunity to similar toxins.
Would you care for a cup? It's the least I can do. ...No?
Well, if you should change your mind, I would be more than willing to prepare some for you.
